text: "Remember the Time" is a song by American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson. It was released as the second single from his album Dangerous (1991) on January 14, 1992. It was written by Teddy Riley, Jackson, and Bernard Belle. When the single was released Jackson dedicated the song with love to Diana Ross. The music video is nine minutes long and features appearances of Eddie Murphy, Iman, and Magic Johnson in the Ancient Egypt. John Singleton directed it. In 2006 the song was released again. It reached number 2 in the Spanish chart. ==Sources== Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:1992 songs Category:New jack swing songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Remember the Time
